channel.title: Posts on Writing practice
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Writing practice

item.title: New begining
item.description: Just saw this article: How Writing Can Help Us With Grief and Trauma from Sustainable Productivity. Before I even finished reading, I decided to try to write something everyday. So I spent two hours tonight before night, setup a new github account and a new github page site. I am almost 40 years old now, everyday I am struggling to keep up to the expectation from everywhere. There is a lot of time I feel no motivation to do anything when I am looking at my long todo list.
